name: Introduction
body:
## **W. Westbrooks**
## Sr. Software Developer
### Houston, Texas Area Oil & Energy

## **Summary**
I have over 15 years of experience developing software in the Oil & Gas industry. I am well versed in Agile software development methodologies, from analysis, planning, coding and testing. I have designed and developed large scale applications and features utilizing a broad range of technologies.

## **Experience**

### **ExxonMobil**
###Senior Software Developer
###August 2012 – Present

WPF, C#, C++, C++\CLI Developer & Architect working in the upstream research department. Developing Geoscience software applications and Petrel plugins using Ocean API & OpenInventor.

### **IHS (formerly SEISMIC MICRO TECHNOLOGY )**
###Senior Software Developer
###November 2005 – August 2012

As a Software Developer at SMT, I am responsible for application development. As a Developer I am part of a team in charge of developing, enhancing and maintaining the largest branch of a very large scale windows based application suite (i.e. Kingdom Suite) used for seismic and geological interpretation in the E&P industry. 

My duties include:

• Developing, enhancing and unit testing software modules in the 2d/3d PAK branch of the application suite using C\C++, C++\CLI (i.e. Interop.), C# .and WPF using MVVM pattern.

• Working with the UI integration team to upgrade various MFC application dialogs, menus , toolbars to overhaul the applications interface & modules, using C++\CLI, C# and WPF .

## **Education**

**B.S., Electrical Engineering**
